tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: RC 747 CRASH!
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: http://www.RCPowers.com/news YOU WANT TO FLY RC? We're working on new ParkJets all the time and we need test pilots! Every week we release the TOP TIPS in our newsletter. All of our best test pilots have already joined and you can join us too. It's easy to sign up, and loaded with free tips to hook you up with the right plane and fly faster! It also has rare discounts to popular RC products! Please sign up and join us here: http://www.RCPowers.com/news . .

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

Reviewer.Books: HAHAHA YOU THINK I READ BOOKS?!?!?!
Reviewer.Movies: Movies: 40 YEAR OLD VIRGIN, TRANSFORMERS, I NOW PRONOUNCE YOU CHCCK AND LARRY, GOOD LUCK CHUCK, SHREK THE THIRD,BLOOD DIAMOND, THE INCREDIBLES. SHOWS: FAMILY GUY, FUTURAMA, ALL OF BET, DIRTY JOBS, MEN VS. WILD.

Reviewer.Job: Server owner+ server super admin X2.

Reviewer.Books:
I don't read to many science fiction books or any sort of fantasy/horror ect.
I like reading the facts on certain things like health books something relating to us humans. Oddly enough I like that kind of stuff... lol
Reviewer.Movies: I don't really have a "favorite" shows or movies at the moment, it changes quickly.
Reviewer.Music: I listen to about the majority of generes of music, but my favorite would be something like Japanese music and maybe some R&B; to be honest I just listen to whatever sounds good to me.

Reviewer.Company: Happy420, Go Hydro, Your Marketing firm, CJRE
Reviewer.Movies: www.1969chevy.net Driving with water as fuel cleans the air as you drive reversing global warming.
Reviewer.Music: www.yourmarketingfirm.com H20 or water is broken down into pure oxygen and hydrogen gas which is highly combustible and gives your car more horsepower than gasoline.

Reviewer.Books: I bet you'd be surprised I've read the BIBLE all the way through over 7 times.
